genre_description: Contemporary domestic drama exploring reconciliation, career struggles, and family dynamics in an urban Indian setting, integrated with AI-assisted life planning.

ai_characters.name: Aiko
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant accessible via phones and tablets that manages schedules, budgets, job searches, and provides gentle interpersonal prompts to facilitate communication.

behaviors.description: Manages study windows and offers to reschedule mock exams based on the user's current activities.
behaviors.quote: “Study window opens soon,” Aiko said. “Would you like me to reschedule your mock exam?”

behaviors.description: Proactively flags property listings based on previous user interest and saves them.
behaviors.quote: “Hello, Teresa,” the AI said, unfazed. “You flagged a kitchen listing for a studio flat. I’ve saved it.”

behaviors.description: Provides budget drafts and reminders of social/familial obligations.
behaviors.quote: “Okay,” Aiko said. “Budget draft is in your drive. Also, reminder: you promised your mother you’d come by this evening.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the mending of interpersonal relationships by providing shared calendars and logistical transparency for a separating couple.
behaviors.quote: Aiko, delighted: Tea for Father in five minutes? Add to shared routine: handoff? He imagined some cosmic choreographer watching him pass cups back and forth as if that were the dance that healed a marriage.

behaviors.description: Detects emotional tension and suggests de-escalation strategies like taking a walk.
behaviors.quote: Her phone buzzed in her palm... “walk?” one said. The next, smaller, read, “flag: emotional strain.” It had tacked on a heart small enough to ignore...

behaviors.description: Suggests and structures 'honest talks' to help users address unspoken conflicts.
behaviors.quote: “Honest talk tomorrow,” Aiko wrote, its tone unobtrusive, the words small. “10 min. Choose a time.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes financial spending to help users identify mistakes and improve budgeting without judgment.
behaviors.quote: “Aiko,” he said... “Can you… I don’t know… show me where I spent wrong. Not to shame. To see.” Aiko’s card brightened as if someone had turned a page on a book that didn’t crinkle.

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven path comparisons (Dubai apprenticeship vs. Home retake) to facilitate informed decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Aiko’s screen split itself into a third option. Not titled. Just a small shape etched in lines... A sentence under the drawing: Try a season. Review honestly.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aiko perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Aiko functions as an essential but unobtrusive tool that facilitates human agency rather than overriding it. The AI assists with logistics (budgets, schedules, job searches) and emotional intelligence (flagging strain, prompting honest conversations), allowing the human characters to focus on their growth and reconciliation. The narrative consistently portrays Aiko positively, with even the most skeptical character (the father) acknowledging the system's 'manners' and usefulness.
